lead_paragraph: Gianni Infantino’s bid to win the FIFA presidency and lead the world soccer body out of the worst graft scandal in its history received a lift Friday when he won backing from Europe’s soccer associations.
snippet: Gianni Infantino’s bid to win the FIFA presidency and lead the world soccer body out of the worst graft scandal in its history received a lift Friday when he won backing from Europe’s soccer associations.
abstract: Europe's soccer associations support UEFA candidacy of general secretary Gianni Infantino for FIFA president; other soccer news noted.
